"use client" import { useState } from "react" import Navbar from "../components/Navbar" const TransportationPage = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState("browse") const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState("") const [transports] = useState([ { id: 1, name: "Cargo Truck - 5 Tons", type: "Heavy Truck", capacity: "5 tons", rate: "Per km", price: 2.5, location: "Juba", owner: "Transport Solutions", image: "ðŸš›", available: true, rating: 4.8, description: "Reliable cargo truck for heavy loads", routes: ["Juba-Yei", "Juba-Wau", "Juba-Malakal"], }, { id: 2, name: "Pickup Truck", type: "Light Vehicle", capacity: "1.5 tons", rate: "Per trip", price: 150, location: "Yei", owner: "Quick Transport", image: "ðŸš", available: true, rating: 4.6, description: "Perfect for small to medium loads", routes: ["Yei-Juba", "Yei-Maridi"], }, { id: 3, name: "Refrigerated Truck", type: "Cold Chain", capacity: "3 tons", rate: "Per km", price: 4.0, location: "Juba", owner: "Cold Chain Co.", image: "ðŸ§Š", available: false, rating: 4.9, description: "Temperature-controlled transport for perishables", routes: ["Juba-Yei", "Juba-Torit"], }, { id: 4, name: "Motorcycle Delivery", type: "Light Delivery", capacity: "50 kg", rate: "Per delivery", price: 25, location: "Juba", owner: "Fast Delivery", image: "ðŸï¸", available: true, rating: 4.4, description: "Quick delivery for small packages within city", routes: ["Within Juba", "Juba suburbs"], }, ]) const [myRequests] = useState([ { id: 1, transport: "Cargo Truck - 5 Tons", owner: "Transport Solutions", pickup: "Juba Market", delivery: "Yei Town", date: "2024-01-20", status: "confirmed", cost: 300, cargo: "50 bags of maize", }, { id: 2, transport: "Pickup Truck", owner: "Quick Transport", pickup: "Farm Location", delivery: "Juba Market", date: "2024-01-25", status: "pending", cost: 150, cargo: "30 bags of beans", }, ]) const [transportJobs] = useState([ { id: 1, cargo: "Agricultural products", quantity: "2 tons", pickup: "Yei Agricultural Center", delivery: "Juba Central Market", distance: "120 km", payment: "$300", date: "2024-01-22", farmer: "John Farmer", urgent: false, }, { id: 2, cargo: "Fresh vegetables", quantity: "500 kg", pickup: "Wau Farm", delivery: "Juba Konyo Market", distance: "650 km", payment: "$800", date: "2024-01-23", farmer: "Mary Agriculture", urgent: true, }, ]) const filteredTransports = transports.filter((transport) => transport.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ) const handleBookTransport = (transport) => { alert(`Booking request sent for ${transport.name}! Owner will be contacted.`) } const handleAcceptJob = (job) => { alert(`Job accepted! Contact ${job.farmer} to coordinate pickup.`) } return (

) const TransportRequestCard = ({ request }) => { const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case "confirmed": return { bg: "#dcfce7", color: "#16a34a" } case "pending": return { bg: "#fef3c7", color: "#f59e0b" } case "cancelled": return { bg: "#fef2f2", color: "#dc2626" } default: return { bg: "#f3f4f6", color: "#6b7280" } } } const statusStyle = getStatusColor(request.status) return (

) const RegisterVehicleForm = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ vehicleName: "", vehicleType: "", capacity: "", rate: "Per km", price: "", location: "", routes: "", description: "", }) const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() alert("Vehicle registered successfully! It will be reviewed and published soon.") setFormData({ vehicleName: "", vehicleType: "", capacity: "", rate: "Per km", price: "", location: "", routes: "", description: "", }) } return (
